title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 45.1 - Taxability of utilities of the first class
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 45.1 - Taxability of utilities of the first class

State Regulations

As hereinbefore noted, utilities of the first class are
taxable on gross income as defined in the statute. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
45.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
